item.title: Anne add a quote by Guns N' Roses
item.description: "Sometimes I wanna kill, sometimes I wanna die, sometimes I wanna destroy, sometimes I wanna cry; sometimes I could get even, sometimes I could give up, sometimes I could give, sometimes I never give a f*ck." -- Guns N' Roses

item.title: Anne add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "If a man does not keep pace with his companions, perhaps it is because he hears a different drummer. Let him step to the music he hears, however measured or far away." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Anne add a quote by Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
item.description: "What experience and history teaches us is that people and governments have never learned anything from history, or acted on principles deduced from it." -- Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

item.title: Anne add a quote by Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
item.description: "America is therefore the land of the future, where, in the ages that lie before us, the burden of the World's History shall reveal itself." -- Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

item.title: Anne add a quote by Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
item.description: "Only one man ever understood me, and he didn't understand me." -- Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

item.title: Anne add a quote by Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
item.description: "Nothing great in the world was accomplished without passion." -- Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

item.title: Anne add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "Most people think that shadows follow, precede or surround beings or objects. The truth is that they also surround words, ideas, desires, deeds, impulses and memories." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Anne add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "There may be times when we are powerless to prevent injustice, but there must never be a time when we fail to protest." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Anne add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "All credibility, all good conscience, all evidence of truth come only from the senses." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Anne add a quote by Charles Dickens
Anne add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster. And if you gaze long enough into an abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Anne add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "In heaven, all the interesting people are missing." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Anne add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "God is dead. God remains dead. And we have killed him. How shall we comfort ourselves, the murderers of all murderers? What was holiest and mightiest of all that the world has yet owned has bled to death under our knives: who will wipe this blood off us? What water is there for us to clean ourselves? What festivals of atonement, what sacred games shall we have to invent? Is not the greatness of this deed too great for us? Must we ourselves not become gods simply to appear worthy of it?" -- Friedrich Nietzsche
